1.title: Decree of Cyrus
1.keyEvent: Cyrus issues decree to rebuild the temple

2.title: Return of Exiles
2.keyEvent: List of those returning to Jerusalem

3.title: Altar and Foundation
3.keyEvent: Rebuilding altar and laying temple foundation

4.title: Opposition to Rebuilding
4.keyEvent: Enemies oppose and halt temple construction

5.title: Prophets Encourage Work
5.keyEvent: Haggai and Zechariah urge rebuilding to resume

7.title: Ezra's Commission
7.keyEvent: Ezra sent to teach the law in Judah

8.title: Ezra's Journey
8.keyEvent: Ezra leads exiles back to Jerusalem safely

9.title: Confession of Sin
9.keyEvent: Ezra mourns intermarriage with foreign peoples

10.title: Covenant to Separate
10.keyEvent: People agree to put away foreign wives
